title: Joining Sephora's Affiliate Program: Requirements, Payment, & More

steps.title: Sephora’s affiliate program lets you earn rewards by promoting products.
steps.content: Sephora’s affiliate program lets you earn rewards by promoting products. The program allows businesses and individuals who are active and have good engagement on social media to partner with Sephora. Affiliates promote products on their social media platforms and in return they receive commission for each purchase, as well as additional benefits like free shipping and exclusive promotions. [1] X Research source You must be at least 18 years old to join the Sephora affiliate program, but Sephora doesn’t mention having a certain number of social media followers required to join. Sephora reviews each application individually to determine if you’d be a good fit.

steps.title: Visit Sephora’s website and click the application link.
steps.content: Visit Sephora’s website and click the application link. Go to Sephora’s affiliate program page on their website. This will provide an overview of the program, as well as a link to the online registration form . Click this link to begin the application process. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Sign up for a Rakuten account and verify your email address.
steps.content: Sign up for a Rakuten account and verify your email address. The application will first require you to make an account with Rakuten Advertising, Sephora’s partner for the affiliate program. Fill out your name, email address, and password. Then, verify your email address.

steps.title: Fill out and submit the application.
steps.content: Fill out and submit the application. Fill out the required information, including things like where you live, your primary business model, and your main social media platform. Once you’ve finished the form, agree to the terms and hit “Submit registration.” [3] X Research source You’ll choose your primary business model from a list on the application. Most individuals’ primary business model will be “Content/niche,” but read the description of each option to be sure.

steps.title: Wait for Sephora to approve your application.
steps.content: Wait for Sephora to approve your application. Once you’ve submitted your application, the Sephora team will review it and decide if you’re a good fit for the program. They will reach out to you via email with their final decision. This could take up to a few weeks. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Start promoting products to earn commission.
steps.content: Start promoting products to earn commission. If your application is approved, Sephora will send you further details about how to promote their products. Follow their guidelines to create appropriate social media content, share your affiliate link, and earn commission for every product purchased through that link. [5] X Research source Affiliates earn commission on all Sephora products, regardless of brand. Promote products like hair care, skincare, bath and body, candles and home scents, and more.

steps.title: Be at least 18 years old and agree to the membership requirements.
steps.content: Be at least 18 years old and agree to the membership requirements. There aren’t many requirements to sign up for the Sephora affiliate program. You must be at least 18 years old or a legal entity (business) and agree to follow the publisher membership agreement and affiliate network policies . [6] X Research source

steps.title: Have an established social media presence.
steps.content: Have an established social media presence. While this isn’t technically a requirement to apply for the program, it’s unlikely Sephora will choose an applicant who isn’t active on social media. Take the time to build your platform (preferably with beauty and fashion content) and grow your following before jumping into affiliate marketing . The more content you have, the easier it will be for Sephora to determine if you’re a good fit. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Have a professional website and email address.
steps.content: Have a professional website and email address. Again, this isn’t technically a requirement, but having a high-quality website can show Sephora that you’re serious about affiliate marketing and influencing. Your website should have its own hosted domain, be well-designed, and be easy to navigate without too many ads. Then, make sure to have an email address that is associated with your website and/or primary social media account. [8] X Research source The email you use should be professional, like a simple first name and last name. Avoid using a bunch of numbers or a silly nickname, as these may lead Sephora to think you don’t take affiliate marketing seriously. If you’re not very familiar with creating a website, hire someone to do it for you. This way, you’ll know it’s professional.

steps.title: Demonstrate how you plan to succeed as an affiliate.
steps.content: Demonstrate how you plan to succeed as an affiliate. It’s important that Sephora feels confident that you can successfully promote their products and bring them new customers. Whether you use content marketing, blogging, SEO, etc., create a marketing plan to show how you plan to bring in targeted traffic. If you’ve been a successful affiliate marketer for other brands, try to demonstrate this, as well. [9] X Research source For example, set goals for how much content you want to promote within a certain timeframe, or how you plan to grow your audience to reach more potential customers. Research your target audience to learn what kind of content and products they want to see.

steps.title: The Sephora affiliate program offers many benefits.
steps.content: The Sephora affiliate program offers many benefits. Joining the Sephora affiliate program is a great way to earn some extra cash, get free items, and get exclusive deals and discounts. Here are all the perks you receive as a Sephora beauty affiliate: [10] X Research source Commission on all products, without brand restriction Free shipping on all orders over $50 Free samples with every order Exclusive newsletters and product sneak peeks Creative banners and graphics to use on your website Affiliate-only special offers and promotions

steps.title: Make high-quality, beauty-related content.
steps.content: Make high-quality, beauty-related content. Because Sephora is a beauty brand, they’re looking for affiliates who produce fashion and beauty content. Provide high-quality, family-friendly, and entertaining content by posting unique photos and videos. Try not to create the same content over and over, as this may cause your followers (and therefore Sephora) to lose interest. [11] X Research source

steps.title: Develop a regular posting schedule.
steps.content: Develop a regular posting schedule. Sephora’s affiliate program is ultimately a way for them to promote their products and get new customers, so they want affiliates who will drive traffic to their website. Because of this, they’re unlikely to choose you if you only post once every few months. Come up with a posting schedule that works for you. While you don’t have to make content every day, it’s a good idea to post at least a couple times a week to show that you’re engaged. [12] X Research source

steps.title: Engage with your followers.
steps.content: Engage with your followers. Sephora considers things like engagement and website traffic when choosing their affiliates. Keep your followers engaged and coming back for more. Respond to comments, ask what kind of content your followers would like to see, and maybe host a giveaway or two. Post polls, ask questions of the day, and host beauty-related Q&A sessions. Remember to use hashtags to reach a larger audience! [13] X Research source

steps.title: Sephora pays affiliates at least 5% commission for each sale.
steps.content: Sephora pays affiliates at least 5% commission for each sale. This means that whenever a customer buys a product from your affiliate link, you earn 5% of the total sale. Some sources say Sephora also pays up to 8-10% commission. [14] X Research source Some affiliates earn over $1000 per month. Try to be active and engaged on social media and promote a variety of products to earn as much money as possible.

steps.title: Affiliates can withdraw their funds once they earn $50.
steps.content: Affiliates can withdraw their funds once they earn $50. Once you’ve made at least $50 in commission, Sephora allows you to transfer your earnings to your bank account via direct deposit or a check. Payment is handled by Sephora’s partner, Rakuten. [15] X Research source Once you hit the $50 threshold, payments will be made monthly.

steps.title: Like all affiliate programs, Sephora’s isn’t perfect.
steps.content: Like all affiliate programs, Sephora’s isn’t perfect. While the pros greatly outweigh the cons, there are some aspects of the program that affiliates think could be better. Here are some potential downsides to consider when trying to find the best affiliate program for you: [16] X Research source The application process can be lengthy. You must earn at least $50 before you can get paid. Affiliates receive payments monthly rather than weekly. The cookie duration is only 24-hours, meaning customers must make a purchase within 24 hours of clicking your affiliate link in order for you to receive commission.

steps.title: Try another beauty affiliate program if Sephora isn’t right for you.
steps.content: Try another beauty affiliate program if Sephora isn’t right for you. If Sephora doesn’t approve your application or you’re not having much luck with the program, research similar programs to see if you can find one that’s a better fit. Here are some other beauty brands for you to consider: [17] X Research source Ulta MAC Cosmetics Glossier Look Fantastic (UK) Elizabeth Arden Estee Lauder Sigma Beauty
